channel.title: How to add dragon claws to 317 PI
channel.description:
I know that I need that .Dat files to put in RAW folder. BUt I don't have a class8.java to edit. I do have actionhandler though? any help would be appreciated.
[317] Project Insanity server

item.title: How to add dragon claws to 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Uh, this is client sided.
You’re going to add it to either itemDef.java or itemDef_2.java.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add dragon claws to 317 PI
